desc: Handmade candles and soap. Each Candle is made from natural soy wax, one of a kind and individually poured. Soaps are all homemade and cold processed with natural ingredients and in small batches.

layout.text: Olde Guy Candles and Olde Gal Soaps
One of a kind unique soy candles in mugs. Wax warmers and wax melts. Homemade soaps, bath bombs, body butters, body scrubs, shampoo, conditioner, lip balm and bath salts.
